BG3 The Dead Shot Location & Where to Find

Location: Stormshore Armoury, Lower City Merchant: Sold by Fytz the Firecracker

The Dead Shot Notes & Tips for BG3

Keen Attack's double proficiency bonus affects only chance to hit, not damage. The Improved Critical effect works with any attack including melee and spells, making this an excellent bow even on a character who does not use ranged attacks. UUID: 269b2b03-aa
